description: Show visually how 1/2 + 1/4 + 1/8 + 1/16 + ... = 1 using a square that gets progressively filled. Start with a unit square, fill half, then half of remaining, etc. Show the sum building up as fractions are added. End with the dramatic reveal that it equals exactly 1.
youtube_title: Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Video) (4K Remaster)
title: The Ultimate Rickroll
